name: Embedded Linux developer (C/C++)
description:
A software and hardware development company based in Ireland with offices, R&D, and manufacturing spread across the globe, including Russia, Georgia, China, the US, and India is looking for responsible, creative and dedicated Senior Embedded Linux Developer.

The company's product line is a whole ecosystem that includes a smart-home controller hub, router, mobile applications, android-based OOT, cloud solution, cybersecurity and parental control software.

The company experienced almost 100% growth Y.o.Y. in size of the engineering team in 2021 and is in an active growing phase.

The company offers dynamic and engaging work duties that provide opportunities for self-development and professional growth, competitive compensation commensurate with skills and experience, and a contributory pension.

Requirements:

  • Experienced in C & C++ for Linux user and kernel spaces, including multithreading and sockets;
  • Good architecture and refactoring skills;
  • Throughout understanding of lower-level network stack: ARP, IP, TCP, UDP, DHCP, DNS, NAT;
  • Can understand and work within complex environments;

  • Good knowledge of basic data structures, understanding of algorithm complexity estimation principles.

Nice-to-have:

None of this is required but we will be impressed if you have:

  • Any OpenWRT based projects experience;
  • Layer 1 and 2 Wi-Fi tuning and optimizations experience;
  • Experience working with Qualcomm SDK for the router on a chip solution like IPQ4019;
  • Understanding of such protocols as MQTT, CWMP (TR-069) / USP (TR-369), UPNP;
  • Experience working in Smart Home or IoT domain;
  • SCRUM/Agile work experience.

Conditions:

  • Remote work;
  • Dynamic and engaging work duties that provide opportunities for self-development and professional growth;
  • Competitive compensation commensurate with skills and experience;
  • Contributory pension.
